00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 
00003   Audacity: A Digital Audio Editor
00004   
00005   Snap.h
00006  
00007   Dominic Mazzoni
00008 
00009   Create one of these objects at the beginning of a click/drag.
00010   Then, given a time corresponding to the current mouse cursor
00011   position, it will tell you the closest place to snap to.
00012 
00013 **********************************************************************/
00014 
00015 #ifndef __AUDACITY_SNAP__
00016 #define __AUDACITY_SNAP__
00017 
00018 #include <wx/defs.h>
00019 #include <wx/dynarray.h>
00020 
00021 #include "Track.h"
00022 #include "ViewInfo.h"
00023 
00024 class TrackClipArray;
00025 class TimeTextCtrl;
00026 
00027 class SnapPoint {
00028  public:
00029    SnapPoint(double t, Track *track) {
00030       this->t = t;
00031       this->track = track;
00032    }
00033    double t;
00034    Track *track;
00035 };
00036 
00037 WX_DEFINE_SORTED_ARRAY(SnapPoint *, SnapPointArray);
00038 
00039 class SnapManager {
00040  public:
00041    // Set gridCtrl to a TimeTextCtrl to use for snap-to-time; if NULL we won't
00042    // snap to time
00043    SnapManager(TrackList *tracks, TrackClipArray *exclusions,
00044                double zoom, int pixelTolerance, bool noTimeSnap = false);
00045 
00046    ~SnapManager();
00047 
00048    // The track may be NULL.
00049    // Returns true if the output time is not the same as the input.
00050    // Pass rightEdge=true if this is the right edge of a selection,
00051    // and false if it's the left edge.
00052    bool Snap(Track *currentTrack,
00053              double t,
00054              bool rightEdge,
00055              double *out_t,
00056              bool *snappedPoint,
00057              bool *snappedTime);
00058 
00059  private:
00060    void CondListAdd(double t, Track *tr, TimeTextCtrl *ttc);
00061    double Get(int index);
00062    double Diff(double t, int index);
00063    int Find(double t, int i0, int i1);
00064    int Find(double t);
00065    bool SnapToPoints(Track *currentTrack, double t, bool rightEdge,
00066                      double *out_t);
00067 
00068    double           mEpsilon;
00069    double           mTolerance;
00070    double           mZoom;
00071    SnapPointArray  *mSnapPoints;
00072 
00073    // Info for snap-to-time
00074    bool             mSnapToTime;
00075    wxString         mFormat;
00076 };
00077 
00078 #endif
